plot: Children are known to love their pets, and so does 7 year old Sofie, when at last she gets the hamster of her dreams. But when Mom and Dad are getting a divorce, a mistreated pet may just do the trick.
title: Her bor Jensen
plot_es: Children are known to love their pets, and so does 7 year old Sofie, when at last she gets the hamster of her dreams. But when Mom and Dad are getting a divorce, a mistreated pet may just do the trick.
plot_en: Children are known to love their pets, and so does 7 year old Sofie, when at last she gets the hamster of her dreams. But when Mom and Dad are getting a divorce, a mistreated pet may just do the trick.
